class that either create a CHF prediction model from scratch using hparams
dictionnary or load a saved one from model\_name from a .h5 file and his hp 
from json

\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
This class create an optimizer for hyperparameter
of deep neural network to predict CHF using 
mainly optuna library
